原作者：Breakfast
翻译者：业余翻译
排版者：业余翻译


原文地址：How to Build a Car Base!




——————————————————————————————————————————————————


原文：


WHAT VEHICLE TO USE FOR WHICH JOB
ALL-ROUNDER: Police, Humvee, Ambulance
TRANSPORT: Ural, Bus, APC, Ambulance
SPEED: Racecar, Roadster
STORAGE: Ural, Explorer
LARGE BASE: Explorer, Firetruck, Bus, Ural, APC

List of top 4 terrible vehicles you could use for a car base:
1.        Snowmobile
2.        Quadbike
3.        Tracter
4.        Golfbuggy

Any I missed? Tell me in comments.



BIG or SMALL
Smaller car bases have less that can go wrong, are faster to make and are cheaper.
















Bigger car bases have more storage, look cooler and have more uses.
Tip: If making a big car base, use torches as platforms and/or as framework to place stuff on and 
use ladders to get higher.




MORE TIPS (for large car bases)
Use torches as a frame to place materials.












Use beds as flooring.













Add small holes near the top for shooting, car bases are great for raids and fire fights.




PROTECTION FROM Evil SNIPERS
Driving around in the world of Unturned can be dangerous thanks to snipers but… there is a solution. Simply use sandbags, planters, crates, generators, etc. to barricade your cab but some servers don’t have 3rd person. Simply place a planter as far into the vehicle’s cab as possible without making your arms stick out the front.


















Because of a glitch you can see through perfectly well but NOT be shot.




PROTECTION FROM BLOODY RAILGUNS
Apply the same technique stated in “PROTECTION FROM SNIPERS” but add sandbags, planters, crates, generators, etc. but mainly barricades (Pine is better for “green maps” like Pei and birch is better for “white maps” like Yukon), cover your whole car with them.





















Railguns can’t blow your car up with only one shot now.




MAKE FROM VEHICLE A COSY HOME
Simply find or make yourself a bed and place it somewhere on or in your vehicle.
Add crates and/or lockers for storage.


















If you die away from base but have your car, you are covered with a close spawn, weapons, ammo and medical supplies.




GROW SOME VEGETABLES MATE
Place planters either in the back or on the top of your car and plant some vegies.












You have got yourself an infinite food source.




We Need a Map!
MAKE A CAR BASE TESTING MAP!
Any creative map makers out there? Enjoy my guide? Well why don't you help it out by making a car base testing map!

















NOTE: you would have full credit of your work but I would post it on this guide!



BEFORE YOU GO! RECRUITING FOR ?ABC?
?ABC?

I have made a group in the hope that all players have a chance against the large kos-ing clans. Please join, play, make new friends but most of all have fun.

A Big Clan (RECRUITING)
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/ABigClan#





THANKS AND RATE UP!
Now go and have fun in your safe, badass, homely and sustainable car base.

(ALWAYS TAKE A GASCAN AND A BLOWTORCH)










翻译：

不同载具涉及的不同领域全能型:警车，悍马，救护车运输型:乌拉尔（Ural），巴士，APC，救护车
速度型:跑车，赛车
储存型:乌拉尔（Ural），探险家（Explorer）（译者：我不知道探险家是啥车）
底部大面积型: 探险家（Explorer），消防车，巴士，乌拉尔（Ural），APC

4大可用作移动基地的可啪载具:1. 机动雪橇（Snowmobile）
2. Quadbike
3. Tracter
4. Golfbuggy（译者：上述4种可用百度查看样子）

如果我漏了啥，请评论区告诉我（译者：请去原帖评论区）


大型基地车或者小型基地车小型基地车 很小几率会出问题，并且制作成本低及效率快。




大型基地车更多的储存空间，看上去也很霸气以及包含了许多可扩展用途。
技巧: 如果选择大型基地车，那么可以使用火把来作为一个平台或者构架，然后放置物件在火把上方，并且可以使用梯子协助爬到高处。




更多用于大型基地车的技巧使用火把来作为框架以便放置新物件。


使用床铺/睡袋作为地板。



墙壁留些空隙用于攻击时或者交火时射击。




提防狙击手因为有狙击手的存在，所以在游戏里开车是一件很危险的事情，但是...我们也有相应的解决方案，可以使用沙袋（sandbags），种植盆（planters），板条箱（crates），发电机（generators）……来放置汽车上作为保护人的障碍，但是有些服务器不支持第三人称视角，所以你可以放置一个种植盆（planters）于驾驶员的位置，并且尽可能的不让驾驶员的身躯暴露外面（译者：应该是利用BUG，把驾驶员的身躯卡在用种植盆（planters）里但又不妨碍视角）。




这样可以让你看的很清楚但又不用担心被射 杀。



提防轨道炮所使用的技巧跟“提防狙击手”一个道理，也是沙袋（sandbags），种植盆（planters），板条箱（crates），发电机（generators）……，但是要求使障碍能覆盖至车身的每一寸肌肤（松树（Pine）材料的物件推荐用于绿油油的地图，类似Pei，桦树（birch ）材料的物件推荐用于白花花的地图，类似Yukon（译者：也就是类似迷彩））。



现在轨道炮就无法一枪击爆你的载具了。



一个温馨的家做一个或者找一个睡袋，并且放置到载具的任何一个地方。
然后再放置些板条箱（crates）或者储物柜（lockers）用于储备。




假设你死了并且离基地很远，不用担心！你还有移动基地车，你可以重新出生并且还有丰富的武器弹药以及医疗物资。



农耕时代放置些种植盆（planters）在基地车的后面或者顶部啥的，然后种些蔬菜。


然后你就有无限的食物来源啦~



我们需要一张特殊的地图!制作一张用于测试基地车的地图M!
有啥心意的地图想公之于众吗？喜欢我的教程吗？那为啥不去做一张用于测试基地车的地图呢！


注意:你的地图要原创的哦，这样我才能帖在我的教程里。（译者：我完全不知道这个小节在说啥，就按照我自己的意思翻了，大概意思就是让玩家自己做个地图来测试基地车）
